timeline.message:
Don't catch Throwable in InternalLoggerFactory

Motivation:

We shouldnt catch Throwable in InternalLoggerFactory as this may hide OOME etc.

Modifications:

Only catch LinkageError and Exception

Result:

Fixes https://github.com/netty/netty/issues/10857

timeline.author: chrisvest

timeline.bodyText: This can catch the more specific (ReflectiveOperationException | SecurityException ignore) unless for some reason Slf4JLoggerFactory is throwing java.lang.Exception.
timeline.author: elharo

replies.bodyText: @elharo I did decide to use Exception as ReflectiveOperationeException not exists in JDK6 :/
replies.author: normanmaurer

replies.bodyText: Netty still supports JDK 6? Impressive. In that case, please add a comment to that effect here for anyone who reads this code in the future. And then LGTM.
replies.author: elharo
